document_data.name: Olodan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Olodan''' was a member of the [[Shadow Druids]] who infiltrated the [[Emerald Grove]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|No one joins the Shadow Druids. Oh, no - their presence is requested.|Olodan}}
document_data.Description: Olodan had white hair worn in dreadlocks, and [[tattoo]]s all across her body and face. She wore a simple leather harness and loincloth.
document_data.Activities: While in the Emerald Grove, Olodan took on the form of a large, gray [[rat]].
document_data.Relationships: While spying upon the druids of the grove, Olodan worked alongside two others of her order, [[Pinta]] and [[Wren (druid)|Wren]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Olodan's cover in the Emerald Grove was still secure. She closely followed her subordinate, [[Kagha]], during the time that she temporarily gained control over the grove, in Master [[Halsin]]'s absence.
